sense.name: An inanimate object makes an explosive sound, perhaps as a sign of failure and possibly producing an emission.
sense.examples: The engines sputtered and died. Oil sputtered everywhere. Oil Faithful sputters consistently.

sense.name: Cause to undergo a process in which atoms are removed.
sense.examples: The solar wind protons must sputter away the surface atoms of dust. The droplets sputtered away atoms of the surface material.

sense.name: Climb awkwardly, as if by scrambling.
sense.examples: She sputtered up the mountain. The climbers sputter up the northern face.

sense.name: An animate agent utters with a spitting sound, as if in a rage.
sense.examples: He sputtered his vile comments before leaving the room. She sputtered a response.
